long_description: The men's REI Trail Running Shorts make outdoor workouts more comfortable, thanks to their lightweight performance fabric and secure storage for trail essentials. Lightweight nylon/spandex fabric offers comfortable stretch, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Breathable side panels offer 4-way stretch for more comfortable striding. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Elastic waistband with drawcord fine-tunes the fit. Zippered front leg pocket can stow an energy bar and energy gel packs. Rip-and-stick back pocket can secure a key and other valuables. Reflective trim increases visibility in low light. The men's REI Trail Running Shorts offer an active fit that allows for a full range of motion.
